events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but one earcup is crackling loudly and the sound is distorted. It seems faulty.
The reported issue has been classified under Product Defect due to malfunctioning hardware with crackling sound.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to review and assist with the defective headphone case.
Hello, I'm Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the crackling issue with your headphones. Let's get this sorted out.
Could you please provide a short video or audio recording demonstrating the crackling sound? Also, confirm if the headphones were dropped or exposed to moisture.
Thanks for the quick reply. I have attached a video showing the crackling sound. The headphones were handled carefully and not exposed to any liquids.
Based on the video, we will arrange a replacement headphone unit at no cost. Please confirm your shipping address so we can proceed with the exchange.
Thank you, that sounds perfect. My shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. Looking forward to the replacement.
The replacement order has been processed and shipped today. You will receive a tracking number shortly via email.
Just checking in to ensure you received the replacement headphones and that they are working perfectly now.
I received the replacement today and tested it thoroughly. The sound quality is excellent with no crackling. Thanks for the great service.
We're glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
